backend/main.mo: Core backend actor implementing product catalog, user profiles, carts, orders, and access control with related query and update methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature-to-file mapping report listing implemented frontend features, related components, and test coverage metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-written summaries of all major frontend source files for reference in build planning.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based style definitions with light/dark theme color variables and base element styling.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point containing root div and script loader for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application router and layout setup defining all top-level routes and theme provider.
frontend/src/components/AuthButton.tsx: Button handling Internet Identity login/logout with loading states and optional profile name display.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer displaying copyright, attribution link, and dynamic app identifier.
frontend/src/components/Navbar.tsx: Sticky navigation bar with logo, search box, cart badge, orders link, and authentication button.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Displays a product card with image, rating, price, and an add-to-cart button using React and UI components.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Shows a modal prompting new authenticated users to enter and save their profile details.
frontend/src/components/QueryState.tsx: Provides UI states for loading, error, empty results, or rendering child content for data queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context and provider for authentication, identity loading, and login state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating products, user profiles, and cart data with actor integration.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup defining theme variables and styles for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/lib/cartLocal.ts: Manages a guest cart in localStorage, including CRUD operations and total calculations.
frontend/src/lib/categories.ts: Exports a list of predefined product categories with icons.
frontend/src/lib/money.ts: Provides helpers for formatting bigint prices into INR currency and compact forms.
frontend/src/lib/validation.ts: Defines checkout form types and validates required fields with email, phone, and postal code format checks.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Displays cart items, supports quantity updates, item removal, subtotal calculation, and checkout navigation.
frontend/src/pages/CatalogPage.tsx: Shows a searchable, filterable, and sortable product catalog with incremental loading.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Handles checkout form input, validation, cart summary, and order submission using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with a hero banner, category grid, and feature highlights.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmationPage: Displays order confirmation details including status, total, items, and customer info.
frontend/src/pages/OrderDetailsPage.tsx: Displays detailed information for a specific order, including items, pricing, and status, using fetched order and product data.
frontend/src/pages/OrdersPage.tsx: Shows a signed‑in user's list of past orders with summary info and links to order detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailsPage.ts: Fetches and presents detailed product info with an image gallery, rating, pricing, quantity selection, and add‑to‑cart functionality.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash‑based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme extensions, colors, typography, animations, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Describes the project state, including requirements, existing features, versioning, and image assets for an e‑commerce app.
